name: e2e-tests
description: Pruebas de extremo a extremo para el sistema de gestión de exámenes

scripts.test:screenshots: playwright test tests/smoke.spec.js --config=playwright.config.media.js --project=chromium && npm run test:summary
scripts.test:videos: playwright test tests/auth.spec.js --config=playwright.config.media.js --project=chromium && npm run test:summary
scripts.test:smoke: playwright test tests/smoke.spec.js --project=chromium && npm run test:summary
scripts.test:auth: playwright test tests/auth.spec.js --project=chromium && npm run test:summary
scripts.test:examenes: playwright test tests/examenes.spec.js --project=chromium && npm run test:summary
scripts.test:ui-only: playwright test tests/navegacion.spec.js --project=chromium && npm run test:summary
scripts.test:mobile: playwright test --project="Mobile Chrome" --project="Mobile Safari" && npm run test:summary
